name: Ferret Battles
description: Use W A S D to move. Press W while on the shop to enter and to drink. E to use the sword and S for the Shield. Shoot zombies and get better weapons in Ferret Battles. Meet the Shop Keeper Parry and buy new items to use in battle. This game couldn't be done without the D7 lounge Discord server. And remember, Ferrets are cool ;)
